vote.title: Authorize acquisition from Joe Delores Deleon and wife, of approximately 3,733 square feet of land near the intersection of Poe and McPherson Streets for the West Dallas Gateway Project - Not to exceed $133,850.00 ($128,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $5,850.00) - Financing: 2024B Certificates of Obligation Fund
